subject: [Baseline] Run C3 vs TM comparison on GPQA and MATH
description:
Run C3 vs TM comparison on GPQA and MATH using stealth prompts.

**Updated plan:**
1. Validate stealth prompts on small sample (N=10)
2. Run C3 on GPQA stealth (categorical_entropy metric)
3. Run TM on GPQA stealth
4. Compare ROC curves and detection performance
5. Repeat for MATH if time permits (cosine distance metric)

**Key decision**: If TM catches stealth prompts, pivot to cascade narrative. If TM fails but C3 works, that's the core ICML result.

See: tmp/experimental_priorities.md for full execution plan
activeForm: Comparing C3 vs TM performance on GPQA/MATH

metadata.next_action: Can now run experiments with agents
